location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '18'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View along the shore at Linga [Lingeh]. A man stands in the water left of centre while to the right a model dhow is floats in front of him. In the right background the high fortified walls of a large structure are visible.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘18’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
